roleset.name: brave, intrepid

example.name: both args
example.text: After interviewing the " Free Syrian Army " active in northern Syria , a female reporter of the US CBS described in her report that these " non-professional armed personnel " were " extremely valiant " in fighting ,

roleset.note: VALIANT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from valiant.01-j)
